original_title: Walk Around the Block with Barney
overview: It's another fun-filled day as Barney and the children make visits to some of the local businesses including Cannoli's Bakery, Bouffant's Barber Shop, Miss Marigold's Flower Shop, the PB&J Cafe, and Green's Grocery. They meet many different people and discover the places which make up a neighborhood. With Barney, children will learn that the people who live next door can be more than just neighbors, they can be friends. Meanwhile, BJ and Baby Bop wait for a surprise from Deborah the delivery lady.
title: Walk Around the Block with Barney
